name: @marianJ97/react-native-biometrics
summary: A fork of React Native library for biometrics
description: A forked repository that comes from SelfLender/react-native-biometrics and includes React Native biometric functionality for signing and encryption that allows additional options when generating keys (more added later)

scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish
